Title: Brushed Bronze Color Quartz Pocket Watch With Necklace Chain, 403744
Description: This is for a Brushed Bronze Color Quartz Pocket Watch With Necklace Chain. The pocket watch with a necklace chain is being listed as pre-owned even though it looks like it has never been used. The watch seems to work real good and keep good time. Not sure how old the battery is or how long it will last. The watch does not appear to be a high quality but rather a lower end quality piece. The watch measures approx. 1-7/8" diameter and about 9/16" thick. The chain measures approx. 29-1/2" long end to end.
